Exact birth date unknown.

Awarded the Diamond Sunburst for his outstanding bravery and skill in the Federated Suns Armed Forces, Justin Allard led a battalion that repelled the Liao invasion on Spica. He single-handedly defeated the invasion's leader, solidifying his reputation as an unmatched pilot. With dark hair and a slender frame, his Capellan heritage stands out among the Federated Suns.
